title: Stalk and Stuff Her
description: I remember the first time I saw her – shining like an angel, miracle in the darkness of my life. I watched her from the shadows, protecting her, but as a crime boss, I knew I couldn’t make an innocent like her mine. At least not until I went legit and left that that all behind me. But now Callie is in danger and I’ve been forced to come out of the darkness to protect her. I’d hoped to keep her from that part of me, but now with the cops chasing me, all I can do is pray for a Christmas miracle to keep the sins from my past from destroying the future I desperately want with the woman of my dreams…
author: Jenna   Rose
